details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.21 Fonts - 7.21.6 Character encodings - Symbolic TrueType fonts
details.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

rule.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary
